item.description:
On Friday, December 1st, we'll be watching a MOTHER TERESA OF CALCUTTA film. She was a fierce warrior for peace in the face of incredible adversity. A true inspiration for all people of all backgrounds and faiths!

I hope you'll join us as we discover this beautiful being, Nobel Peace Prize winner and warrior for the underserved on what is sure to be a facinating & inspiring night!

Till then,
Rev Rachel.
item.name: Our next Film!
